tr.td: Relevant information in the context of this prescription concerning possible contra indication. For example presence of devices or (suspected) pregnancy. When detailed information can be given, it is RECOMMENDED to express it as structured as possible. If prescriber has no knowledge of contra indication, this SHALL be expressed with a 'ASKU' nullFlavor ( = Information was sought but not found ) in codeableConcept.

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: Logical model describing the model for the diagnostic imaging prescription. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

definition.value: Logical model describing the model for the diagnostic imaging prescription. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.

short.value: When this prescription was created

definition.value: When this prescription was created

short.value: The prescribing healthcare party

definition.value: The prescribing healthcare party

short.value: Information about co prescribers

definition.value: Information about co prescribers

short.value: The co-prescriber party

definition.value: The co-prescriber party

short.value: Type of the practitioner

definition.value: Type of the practitioner

short.value: Status of co prescribing status (to sign, signed or refused)

definition.value: Status of co prescribing status (to sign, signed or refused)

short.value: The SSIN of the person for which the referral is prescribed.

definition.value: The SSIN of the person for which the referral is prescribed.

short.value: An identifier for the ReferralPrescription, e.g. the UHMEP identifier, once available

definition.value: An identifier for the ReferralPrescription, e.g. the UHMEP identifier, once available

short.value: An identifier for the Prescription Proposal Support

definition.value: An identifier for the Prescription Proposal Support

short.value: Reason for not following the PPS suggestion

definition.value: Reason for not following the PPS suggestion

short.value: An identifier for the bundle this prescription belongs to. The type of bundle can be indicated in the type of the identifier

definition.value: An identifier for the bundle this prescription belongs to. The type of bundle can be indicated in the type of the identifier

short.value: The original request or prescription triggered this prescription

definition.value: The original request or prescription that is the reason for this request - for example when a detailed request is created by a broader request.

short.value: Period of validity of prescription

definition.value: Period of validity of prescription

short.value: When this prescription is executed, available after start of execution

definition.value: When this prescription is executed, available after start of execution

short.value: The latest moment to end this treatment

definition.value: The latest moment to end this treatment

short.value: The intended provider, i.e. who is expected to perform the procedure - a specific person or a speciality

definition.value: The intended provider, i.e. who is expected to perform the procedure - a specific person or a speciality

short.value: A reference to the provider party (e.g. a NIHDI number for a healthcare professional, a SSIN or only a displaystring for a non professional caregiver,...)

definition.value: A reference to the provider party (e.g. a NIHDI number for a healthcare professional, a SSIN or only a displaystring for a non professional caregiver,...)

short.value: The required discipline of the provider party

definition.value: The required discipline of the provider party

short.value: Start and enddate for the particular provider

definition.value: Start and enddate for the particular provider

short.value: Reference to an organization that will add the performer

definition.value: Reference to an organization that will add the performer

short.value: The current prescription should be performed after this one

definition.value: The current prescription should be performed after this one

short.value: What is prescribed

definition.value: What is prescribed

short.value: The problem (code or reference) that is the main reason for this prescription

definition.value: The problem (code or reference) that is the main reason for this prescription

short.value: Care Set Problem

definition.value: Care Set Problem

short.value: True if the prescriber wants feedback. Other caregivers can be mentioned in the note

definition.value: True if the prescriber wants feedback. Other caregivers can be mentioned in the note

short.value: Current status

definition.value: Current status

short.value: Reason current status

definition.value: Reason current status

short.value: Status of the treatment

definition.value: Status of the treatment

short.value: Reason treatment status

definition.value: Reason treatment status

short.value: Place where the treatment should be executed

definition.value: Place where the treatment should be executed

short.value: Anatomical place where the treatment should be executed

definition.value: Anatomical place where the treatment should be executed

short.value: Side of the body

definition.value: Side of the body

short.value: Additional text notes about the request.

definition.value: Additional text notes about the request.

short.value: Proposal, Prolongation, Prescription

definition.value: Proposal, Prolongation, Prescription

short.value: Relevant information in the context of this prescription concerning for example allergies, kidney function, diabetic. When detailed information can be given, it is RECOMMENDED to express it as structured as possible.

definition.value: e.g. stomach ache during 10 days, echo suspected damage kidneys, complaints of patients, allergies,...

short.value: Either in text or in a coded format. At the discretion of the prescribing party.

definition.value: e.g. Cyste? Metastasis?

short.value: Relevant information in the context of this prescription concerning possible contra indication. For example presence of devices or (suspected) pregnancy. When detailed information can be given, it is RECOMMENDED to express it as structured as possible. If prescriber has no knowledge of contra indication, this SHALL be expressed with a 'ASKU' nullFlavor ( = Information was sought but not found ) in codeableConcept.

definition.value: e.g.pregnancy, devices, kidney functioning

short.value: Questionnaire responses

definition.value: Questionnaire responses

short.value: Any document added as extra information

definition.value: Any document added as extra information

short.value: If vital to this request, references may be given to previous diagnostic imaging

definition.value: If vital to this request, references may be given to previous diagnostic imaging

short.value: bodySite, e.g. using a SNOMED-CT code

definition.value: bodySite, e.g. using a SNOMED-CT code

short.value: What to do - coded or as text within the codeableConcept

definition.value: What to do - coded or as text within the codeableConcept
Logical model describing the model for the diagnostic imaging prescription. This draft is used in the HL7 Belgian workgroup for referral.
